login_fail: The email and password that you've entered is incorrect
regiser_fail: Information that you've entered is incorrect
warning_verify_register: Your email address hasn't been verified. Please click the verification link in the email that was sent to the address you signed up with. (Don't forget to check your spam folder.)
not_receive_mail: if you are unable to locate your activation email.
start_day: Start date must be greater than current date
end_day: End date must be greater than start date or current date
comfirm-join-campaign: Do you want to join to this campaign?
comfirm-leave-campaign: Do you want to leave to this campaign?
join_campaign_success: You joined to campaign is successfully!
join_campaign_fail: You join to campaign is fail!
